facts.content: Routine day at the office. Attended meetings, reviewed some code, replied to emails. Nothing particularly exciting or frustrating.
Finished reading a technical book on system design. Some concepts are still unclear, but I'm starting to see patterns in how large systems are built.
Working on documentation today. Not the most exciting task, but it needs to be done. At least I can listen to music while writing.
Database performance issues are getting worse. Every query is slow. Management is pushing for faster delivery but the infrastructure isn't ready.
Working on documentation today. Not the most exciting task, but it needs to be done. At least I can listen to music while writing.
